title: Kidou Senshi Gundam Unicorn: Bande Dessinee
original_name: 機動戦士ガンダム UC バンデシネ
sinopse: Set 3 years after the events of Char's Counterattack, a young man is caught in a deadly conflict between the Earth Federation and Terrorist Organization "The Sleeved" as they battle for an object that is said to have changed the course of Human history.
